title: Mahou Shoujo Tokushusen Asuka (Magical Girl Spec-Ops Asuka)
synopsis: Three years ago, a bloodthirsty race of interdimensional beings known as the Disas appeared and destroyed everything they could reach on Earth. With regular weapons rendered useless, humanity's only hope of survival relied on humans who became magical girls after forming an alliance with the Spirit Realm, who had followed the Disas to Earth. After a violent conflict, the squad of magical girls emerge victorious, with the survivors now known as the "Magical Five."
characters: ['Ootorii, Asuka', 'Mugen, Kurumi', 'Cyrus, Mia', 'Yonamine, Chisato', 'Volkova, Tamara', 'Makino, Nozomi', 'Peipei, Lau', 'Hata, Sayako']
voices: ['Suzaki, Aya', 'Sekine, Akira', 'Matsui, Eriko', 'Taketatsu, Ayana', 'Takahashi, Rie', 'Hikasa, Youko']
